references.paper_title: Score-based generative modeling through stochastic differential equations
references.reason: This paper introduces the foundation of score-based generative models (SGMs) using stochastic differential equations, which is the primary focus of the current research.
This paper presents denoising diffusion probabilistic models, a key SGM variant analyzed in this work.

references.paper_title: Sampling is as easy as learning the score: theory for diffusion models with minimal data assumptions
references.reason: This paper provides a theoretical analysis of SGMs under minimal assumptions, which is relevant to the robustness analysis of the current research.

references.paper_title: Diffusion models are minimax optimal distribution estimators
references.reason: This paper establishes the optimality of diffusion models as distribution estimators, which is a relevant result to the theoretical contributions.
This book is a comprehensive overview of PDE theory, which forms the mathematical foundation for many of the theoretical results in this work.
